sect1.title: 简介
sect1.para: YCRM客户关系管理系统是一套基于B/S结构的客户关系管理系统.

sect1.title: License
sect1.para: The AutoPHPFramework is licensed under BSD and is free to use in Open Source and closed commercial projects. You must however maintain the original copyright notice as described in the license. The BSD license gives the enduser much greater freedom to use the software than any of the GPL family and its derivatives.
